item.title: Super Eights (match 22): New Zealand eliminated by England
item.description: World Twenty20 Match 22: England 153/7 (19.1 ov) beat New Zealand 149/6 (20 ov) by 3 wickets.

item.title: Super Eights (match 21): South Africa crashes out of the WT20
item.description: World Twenty20 Match 21: Pakistan 148/7 (20 ov) beat South Africa 137/7 (20 ov) by 11 runs.

item.title: Super Eights (match 20): Australia cruise to 81-run triumph over SL
item.description: World Twenty20 Match 20: Australia 168 for 5 (White 85*, Randiv 3-20) beat Sri Lanka 87 (Johnson 3-15, Nannes 2-19)

item.title: Super Eights (match 19): India lose tamely to West Indies
item.description: World Twenty20 Match 19: West Indies 169/6 (20 ov) beat India 155/9 (20 ov) by 14 runs.

item.title: Super Eights (match 18): Comprehensive win for England
item.description: World Twenty20 Match 18: England 168/7 (20 ov) beat South Africa 129 (19 ov) by 39 runs.

item.title: Super Eights (match 17): New Zealand edge out Pakistan
item.description: World Twenty20 Match 17: New Zealand 133/7 (20 ov) beat Pakistan 132/7 (20 ov) by 1 run.

item.title: Super Eights (match 16): Sri Lanka overwhelm Windies
item.description: World Twenty20 Match 16: Sri Lanka 195/3 (20 ov) beat West Indies 138/8 (20 ov) by 57 runs

item.title: Super Eights (match 15): Australia outclass India
item.description: World Twenty20 Match 15: Australia 184/5 (Warner 72, Watson 54) beat India 135 (Rohit 79*, Tait 3-21, Nannes 3-25) by 49 runs

item.title: Super Eights (match 14): South Africa beat New Zealand by 13 runs
item.description: World Twenty20 Match 14: South Africa 170/4 (20 ov) beat New Zealand 157/7 (20 ov) by 13 runs

item.title: Super Eights (match 13): England beat Pakistan by six wickets
item.description: World Twenty20 Match 13: England 151/4 (19.3 ov) beat Pakistan 147/9 (20 ov) by 6 wickets

item.title: Group Stage match 12: South Africans outclass Afghans
item.description: South Africa 139/7 (20 ov) beat Afghanistan 80 (16 ov) by 59 runs

item.title: Group Stage match 11: Australia crush Bangladesh
item.description: Australia 141/7 (20 ov) beat Bangladesh 114 (18.4 ov) by 27 runs

item.title: Group Stage match 10: Rain saves England
item.description: England 120/8 (Morgan 45) v Ireland 14/1 - match abandoned

item.title: Group Stage match 9: New Zealand cruise into the Super 8s
item.description: New Zealand 36/1 beat Zimbabwe 84 (McCullum 3-16, Styris 3-5) by seven runs by D/L method

item.title: Group Stage match 8: Windies clinch rain-curtalied thriller
item.description: West Indies 60/2 (Gayle 25) beat England 191/5 (Morgan 55, Wright 45*) by D/L method

item.title: Group Stage match 7: Jayawardene 100 wins it for Lanka
item.description: Sri Lanka 173/7 (Jayawardene 100) beat Zimbabwe 29/1 in 5 overs by 14 runs - D/L method

item.title: Group Stage match 6: Australia seal easy win over Pakistan
item.description: Australia 191 (Watson 81, Hussey 53, Aamer 3-23) beat Pakistan 157 (Misbah 41, Tait 3-20, Nannes 3-41) by 34 runs

item.title: Group Stage match 5: Raina takes India to Super 8
item.description: India 186 for 5 (Raina 101, Yuvraj 37) beat South Africa 172 for 5 (Kallis 73) by 14 runs

item.title: Group Stage match 4: Pakistan hold off Tigers
item.description: Pakistan 172/3 beat Bangladesh 151/7 by 21 runs

item.title: Group Stage match 3: India defeat Afghanistan by seven wickets
item.description: India 116/3 beat Afghanistan 115/8 by seven wickets

item.title: Group Stage match 2: Ireland hammered by West Indies
item.description: West Indies 138/9 (20 ov) beat Ireland 68 (16.4 ov) by 70 runs

item.title: Group Stage match 1: New Zealand defeat Sri Lanka by two wickets
item.description: New Zealand 139/8 (19.5 ov) beat Sri Lanka 135/6 (20 ov) by 2 wickets
